data.message: I like your Illuminati puppet necklace you brain washed douche

replies.message: Haha Kayla the necklace is a triangle for recovery you idiot! Your obviously the one brainwashed! Think before you speak!
Now anything with a triangle is illuminati. Think of how ridiculous that sounds.

Hahaha if you really think it's for recovery your obviously the brain washed one. Do some fucking research they bombard idiots like you with symbols and celebrities like this one. If you think it's not true you deserve to be wiped off this earth like the new world order is intending to do. Fucking sheep

Oh thank you for your insight and helping me see it's for "aa" maybe because addicts make the best sheep. easily led, naive, weak willed, and no self control. Just what they want. Good luck with believing anything the tell you... baaaaaaa.

i'm guessing you're the type of person that thinks Pac's still alive.. Idiot.. and I'm an addict and addicts are some of the strong willed people you'll ever meet (you have no idea what you're talking about, it's not will power it's a disease)
Get fucking life Kayla instead of banging ur fucking head on a wall and letting ur baby eat condoms off the ground..

Hahaha oh wow thanks for your sweet come back you sir are a witty son of a bitch. .. if you can't have an opinion in this country and only get ridiculed for speaking the truth then this is county is shitter than I thought. Because of idiots like you all. Baa baa black sheep. go suck eminems cock
The Illiminati is bullshit. Stop getting so worked up over nothing. You'll pop a blood vessel. Maybe he just likes triangles. Who knows? Who fucking cares? Jesus Christ.
Shut up meggggg...no body asked you
Haha somebody's a self absorbed bitch!!! Your right don't let anyone try and tell you otherwise, pfft! Free WORLD niggaz
I think the only brain washed person here is you.
So anyway Kayla, where did you get your information from ? PROVE YOUR THEORY OR SHUT THE FUCK UP. :)
